channel.title: CVPR on ODYSSEY
channel.description: Recent content in CVPR on ODYSSEY

item.title: AdCo论文笔记
item.description: 我的启发 看看 引用 AdCo: Adversarial Contrast for Efficient Learning of Unsupervised Representations from Self-Trained Negative Adversaries, CVPR, 2021, https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.08435. 博客 已经有其他很多博客写过了。我觉得写得也很清楚。这里是我看过的几篇。 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/258958247 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/197802321 简介 如下图，对一个
